## Bio

My name is Bill Muchero and I’m a data-driven analyst with a solid foundation in both business strategy and technical analytics, holding a Master’s in Data Science and Analytics and a Bachelor’s in International Business. My skills in Power BI, Python, R, and SQL help me turn complex data into clear, actionable insights that support smarter decision-making.

In previous roles, I’ve built interactive dashboards, researched AI tools for qualitative analysis, and contributed to cross-functional projects focused on data collection and visualization. I'm passionate about solving problems with data and making a measurable impact through analytical thinking and effective communication.
